plays.text: Penalty to Glen Wesley 2 minutes for Hooking Kris Draper
Penalty to Erik Cole 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dominik Hasek
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for High Sticking Bates Battaglia

Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for Boarding Brendan Shanahan
